TILE_STUDENT.TITLE: My student cards
TILE_STUDENT.DESCRIPTION: Find your student card valid throughout Europe and your UL student card

TILE_STAFF.TITLE: Carte UL
TILE_STAFF.DESCRIPTION: This card allows you to prove your status at UL and your registration at SUAPS

ERRORS_STUDENT.NO_PHOTO: Access to your card will be available after providing a photo ID to the school
ERRORS_STUDENT.NO_ACTIVE_CARD: You do not have an active card at the University
ERRORS_STUDENT.UNPAID_FEES: You do not have a student card because you have not yet paid your registration fees

ERRORS_STAFF.NO_PHOTO: Access to your card will be available after providing a photo ID to University Human Resources

ERRORS_STAFF.UNPAID_FEES: You do not have a student card because you have not yet paid your registration fees
